short_summary: Fisheries and Oceans Canada Fisheries and Oceans Canada, seeking One (1) Skid Steer Tracked Loader.
description: This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-19BCKH/A. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-651-78185.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

####  **Title of the Tender**
One (1) Skid Steer Tracked Loader

#### Reference Number
PW-22-01012402

#### Solicitation Number
30003607

#### Publication Date
November 3, 2022 - Appel d’offres de publiee: 2022-11-03

#### Tender Closure Date
Submission deadline: November 9, 2022, 2:00 PM (AST) - Appel d’offres date cloture: 2022-11-09T14:00:00

#### Solicitation URL
You can view the solicitation documents on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) at this link: [link]

#### Solicitation Description
Financial services of one (1) Skid Steer Tracked Loader are solicited through this bid solicitation process. This acquisition process is restricted only to pre-qualified suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-19BCKH/A.

If you are interested in being part of this group of pre-qualified suppliers, you can access this RFSA on the Government of Canada Tender Information System. Suppliers who wish to be added to the list of pre-qualified suppliers must meet specific eligibility requirements and can contact the centre desk for further information.

#### Required Documentation
A copy of the relevant solicitation documents and attachments are available at the following links to the Government of Canada Tender Information System:

*  EN (English)
	+ [Link](url)
*  FR (French)
	+ [Link](url)

#### Contact Information

If you wish to participate in this bid solicitation and acquire a copy of the documents, you can reach out to:

* Stephanie Patry, contract procurement
* Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* 200 Kent St, Station 13E228
* Ottawa, Ontario
* K1A 0E6
* Email: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Phone: n/a
* Fax: n/a

For all other inquiries about this bid solicitation, the applicable sections of the Public WLvernsnt Buy Practices and the applicable sections of the Trade Agreements Act. Please note that bids must be received at the above address by the specified deadline, noting the exact date and time captured in (3) above.

 Dispose des documents pertinents
